verses.verse: <S%H5315><s%>"'When anyone <S%H7126>offers<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> of a <S%H4503>meal<s%> offering to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour;<s%> and he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on <S%H5414>it,<s%> and put frankincense on <S%H3828>it.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests;<s%> and he shall <S%H7061>take<s%> <S%H8033>his<s%> <S%H7062>handful<s%> of its fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and of its <S%H8081>oil,<s%> with all its <S%H3828>frankincense;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> its <S%H234>memorial<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

That which is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>'. It is a <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> thing of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire.<s%>

<S%H7126><s%>"'When you offer an <S%H4503>offering<s%> of a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H3989>baked<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven,<s%> it shall be <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> or <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
If your <S%H4503>offering<s%> is a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H4227>griddle,<s%> it shall be of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
You shall <S%H6626>cut<s%> it in <S%H6595>pieces,<s%> and <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on <S%H4503>it.<s%> It is a meal offering.
If your <S%H4503>offering<s%> is a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H4802>pan,<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of these things to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and it shall be <S%H7126>presented<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and he shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> it to the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7311>take<s%> from the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> its <S%H234>memorial,<s%> and shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

That which is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>'. It is a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire.<s%>

<S%H4503><s%>"'No meal offering, which you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H2557>yeast;<s%> for you shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> no <S%H2557>yeast,<s%> nor any <S%H1706>honey,<s%> as an <S%H801>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

As an <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> them to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> but they shall not <S%H5927>ascend<s%> for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Every <S%H7133>offering<s%> of your meal <S%H7133>offering<s%> you shall <S%H4414>season<s%> with <S%H4417>salt;<s%> neither shall you allow the <S%H4417>salt<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> to be <S%H7673>lacking<s%> from your meal <S%H4503>offering.<s%> With all your <S%H4503>offerings<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4417>salt.<s%>

<S%H7126><s%>"'If you offer a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> for the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> of your first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> grain in the <S%H24>ear<s%> <S%H7033>parched<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H1643>bruised<s%> grain of the fresh <S%H3759>ear.<s%>
You shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on <S%H5414>it,<s%> and lay <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on <S%H4503>it:<s%> it is a meal offering.

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> as its <S%H234>memorial,<s%> part of its bruised <S%H1643>grain,<s%> and part of its <S%H8081>oil,<s%> along with all its <S%H3828>frankincense:<s%> it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
